DOC.brief_summary: Our study aim evaluate consumption Fruit Vegetable Juice Concentrate ( FVJC ) vs. placebo exert change serum level Retinol Binding Protein 4 ( RBP4 ) , carotenoid , tocopherol , antioxidant capacity , pro-inflammatory marker , insulin sensitivity conjunction weight management cohort lean compare overweight healthy six ten year-old boy . The boy undergo detailed medical family history complete physical examination screen visit . Careful anthropometric measure body composition DEXA perform . Nutritional exercise counsel give start study . The outcome measure include difference serum RBP4 , antioxidant level , inflammatory marker insulin sensitivity baseline six month consumption FVJC randomize double blind placebo control manner .
DOC.brief_title: Fruit Vegetable Juice Concentrate Effects RBP4 Antioxidant Capacity Lean Overweight 6-10 Year Old Boys
DOC.criteria: 610 year old healthy boy Lean overweight Have start puberty Chronic illness , asthma , GI disorder Vegan Diet Use routine medication vitamins 4 week study
